channel.description: Recent content in Supertramp on Music

item.title: Supertramp - The Logical Song
item.description:
When I was young
it seemed that
Life was so wonderful
a miracle
Oh it was
beautiful magical
And all the birds
in the trees
Well they’d be singing
so happily
Joyfully playfully
watching me
But then they
send me away
To teach me
how to be sensible
Logical responsible
practical
And they showed me
a world
Where I could be
so dependable
Clinical intellectual
cynical
There are times when
all the world’s asleep
The questions run
too deep
For such a simple man
won’t you please
Please tell me
what we’ve learned
I know it sounds
absurd
But please tell me
who I am
Now watch
what you say
Or they’ll be
calling you
A radical liberal
fanatical criminal
Won’t you sign up
your name
We’d like to
feel you’re
Acceptable
respectable
Presentable
a vegetable-

At night when
all the world’s asleep
The questions run
so deep
For such a simple man
won’t you please
Please tell me
what we’ve learned
I know it sounds
absurd
But please tell me
who I am
Who I am who I am
who I am-
